text: Rafael Gallardo García (28 October 1927 - 30 January 2021) was a Mexican Roman Catholic bishop. Gallardo García was born in Yuriria, Mexico. He became a priest in 1950. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Linares, Mexico, from 1974 to 1987. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Tampico, Mexico, from 1987 to 2003. Gallardo García died on 30 January 2021, aged 93.Rafel Gallardo Garcia ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops
